title: Metacognitive and Presence-Enhanced Process for Online Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Case-based learning environments utilizing VR simulations and digital collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can apply metacognitive strategies (self-regulation and co-regulation) with over 80% frequency when analyzing complex business cases.
Learners can execute interaction techniques to enhance social presence in online learning environments with over 75% accuracy.
Learners can improve problem-solving abilities using cognitive presence in VR-based simulations by 30% compared to pre-assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
